p: Furthermore, Gordon et al. ( 2020) and de Wit et al. ( 2020) revealed that RDV derives anti-viral effects against MERS-CoV though inhibition of RNA polymerase. As with SARS-CoV investigations treated by RDV, similar outcomes were observed for MERS-CoV along with limited weight loss, increased pulmonary activity and decreased virus replication (Sheahan et al., 2017).
